name: Breaking fat (Schodingerskitty)
description:
Had problems installing unity and visual studio so it's a pretty empty game </3

Idea: Game where Garry wants to escape the prison by making himself fatter and fatter until he's too big for his prison cell, resulting in his priso cell exploding and Garry being able to walk freeeee.

Every time Garry eats something he gets bigger so you have to think about which meat to eat first so you can fit through gaps.
